keyword: calories in a auntie annes pretzel
title: Calories in an Auntie Anne's Pretzel
meta_description: Discover calories in a auntie annes pretzel, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium details, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in an Auntie Anne's Pretzel
assumptions: Standard original soft pretzel from Auntie Anne's, fresh-baked, approximately 115 g, no dips or additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact recipe, serving size, and customizations. Check Auntie Anne's nutritional info for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Auntie Anne's pretzel provides about 280 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a auntie annes pretzel?
faqs.a: Approximately 280 kcal for one standard original pretzel.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in an Auntie Anne's pretzel?
faqs.a: About 51 g carbs, including 2 g fiber and 10 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is an Auntie Anne's pretzel high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 731 mg sodium per pretzel due to salt topping.

faqs.q: How much protein in one Auntie Anne's pretzel?
faqs.a: Roughly 9 g protein per standard pretzel.

faqs.q: Do Auntie Anne's pretzels have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in the original pretzel.
